page.title: 06 LOCAL NEWS
page.content: Joe Mullen from Springside is a member of Springside Boxing Club and he recently won the Gaelic Championship. He is the second member of the family to hold this title.Alec Mullen, also from Springside was in Budapest recently as a member of the Scottish team taking part in the European Boxing Championships.The under 13 team from the local football club, Springside Colts have won a place in the final of the Nancy Connor memorial trophy.Crosshouse Primary School held their prize-giving recently and the boys sports champion was Robert Faulds and the girls sports champion was Arlene Goldie. There will be fund-raising discos in the community centre to raise money for the Crosshouse Summer Playscheme.
